couponSystemSingelton

Class CouponSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • couponSystemSingelton.CouponSystem

  • public class CouponSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    This class serves as a base for connection of the Coupon system components Allows the entrance to subscribers and to carry out actions for the identified users.
    Version:
    1.00, 28/07/2016
    Author:
    Morris Elkanaev

      • getInstace

        public static CouponSystem getInstace()

      • login

        public CouponClientFacade login(java.lang.String userName,
                                java.lang.String password,
                                java.lang.String clientType)
                         throws CouponSystemException
        This method allows to log in - get following parameters userName, password and clientType. By the clientType the method knows what type it is necessary to return - CustomerFacade, CompanyFacade or AdminFacade.
        Parameters:
        userName - giving the userName from another method
        password - giving the password from another method
        clientType - giving the clientType from another method
        Returns:
        couponClientFacade the couponClientFacade
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - If an exception occurred

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
              throws CouponSystemException
        This method stop the task and closing the opened connection
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - CouponSystemException If an exception occurred
        See Also:
        DailyCouponExpirationTask class.

        DailyCouponExpirationTask.stopTask()
        ConnectionPool.getInstance().closeAllConnections()
